MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task LoginAsync (string scopes);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task LoginAsync(string scopes) cil managed
Public Function LoginAsync (scopes As String) As Task
member this.LoginAsync : string -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.param: The string of Microsoft Token scopes of access separated by space. Default value is `.default`.
Docs.summary:
Popup login page to get user's access token with specific scopes.
For example:
await teamsUserCredential.LoginAsync("User.Read"); // single scopes using string await teamsUserCredential.LoginAsync("User.Read Calendars.Read"); // multiple scopes using string
Docs.remarks: Can only be used within Teams.
Docs.exception: When failed to login with unknown error.
When simple auth server failed to exchange access token.
When user canceled or failed to consent.
When runtime is not in browser enviroment.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task LoginAsync (string[] scopes);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task LoginAsync(string[] scopes) cil managed
Public Function LoginAsync (scopes As String()) As Task
member this.LoginAsync : string[] -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.param: The array of Microsoft Token scopes of access. Default value is `[.default]`.
Docs.summary:
Popup login page to get user's access token with specific scopes.
For example:
await teamsUserCredential.LoginAsync(new string[] { "User.Read" }); // single scope using string array await teamsUserCredential.LoginAsync(new string[] { "User.Read Calendars.Read" }); // multiple scopes using string array
Docs.remarks: Can only be used within Teams.
Docs.exception: When failed to login with unknown error.
When simple auth server failed to exchange access token.
When user canceled or failed to consent.
When runtime is not in browser enviroment.
